name: Dream Catcher (itch) (Spera_blues)
description:
Platformer, look for your dream and acquire them to gain their powers to make a way for you but careful lose your dreams and you will lose your life.

A solo project, I had fun working on the idea and the art, while experimenting with new ideas, was created for the B&W jam. 

I hope you'll enjoy it, and tell me what title you will earn.
